TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowViewStateService extends System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateService

summary.span: 管理活動設計工具及其基礎模型項目的檢視狀態。

span.span: Manages the view state of the activity designer and its underlying model items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作並產生文字屬性來儲存和擷取其值，從關聯的控制項的檢視狀態。Implements and generates a text property that stores and retrieves its value from an associated control's view state.

summary.span: 記錄指定之索引鍵表示之項目的目前設定，讓該設定能夠提供給復原作業使用，然後將指定之索引鍵表示的項目儲存在指定之模型項目的檢視狀態中。
